title: Former LVMH Exec Weighs in on Earnings, Luxury Outlook
description: Pauline Brown, former chair of LVMH North America, discusses LVMH’s outlook and the global luxury market with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” She says interest has picked up to levels she hasn’t seen in years, but the key question is whether it converts into sales. (Source: Bloomberg)
